item.description:
Music is supplied by a DJ.

He'll play all kinds of music, including both fast and slow, modern and oldies, disco, swing, Latin, and rock.

The DJ will take song requests.

Large dance floor.

Proper attire is required. No jeans or sneakers, no work boots

Cover Charge is $12 before 9 PM, but $15 after 9 pm.

We have some tables reserved just for MEETUP groups. There will be signs on those tables.

I am posting this event with many different meetup groups, but all groups will sit together, so it doesn't matter which meetup group is listed on the back of the MEETUP sign.

I suggest arriving before 8:30 to make sure there is room at one of our tables for you.

There are some free food items available during the first hour.

There have been crowds of over 300 people at this dance.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask at the admissions desk where meetup groups are; look for MEETUP signs on tables.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Together Singles Dance
